titleStmt.title: The charter of Romney-Marsh, or, The laws and customs of Romney Marsh very useful for all professors of the law, and also for all lords of towns ... / framed and contrived by the Venerable Justice Henry de Bathe.
titleStmt.author: Romney Marsh (England)
Bathe, Henry de, d. 1260.

editionStmt.edition: The fourteenth impression, more corrected than the former.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.R. for Samuel Keble,

notesStmt.note: English and Latin on facing pages.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
